## Flow of course

- Data frames, intro to R for data frame manipulation
- point plots,model expressions as tilde expressions for plotting
- Variance and violin plots
- mean as *best* model for no explanatory and categorical explanatory 
- least squares critereon for numerical explanatory
- basic regression models and getting the model function from regression output
- "adjusting for"
- "explaining variability" and R-squared, signal and noise
- Population and sample: parameters and estimates. Inference based on samples
- probability distributions
- sampling variation
- confidence bands for means
- confidence bands for linear models
- Hypothesis testing
- business applications
- Projects
